amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to require the Center for Disease Control and Prevention to provide a report to C ongress on the activities of grant awardees funded through the Rape Prevention and Education (RPE) grant program, as well as on emerging best practices relating to rape prevention and education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Torres (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
